positives: ◦ Deep connections formed by sharing honest

detailedPrediction: With the Moon in your sign, you feel more confident but must lead with maturity and honor. A subtle shift in luck is occurring, making this an ideal time to act on professional intuition. The planetary background in Capricorn requires you to stay disciplined and duty-bound. General Advice: Lead with maturity. Sincerity is required over flirtation; honor your promises to maintain your growing prestige.
